description: This file defines a Flutter widget ChatScreen used for a chat interface with hotel staff. It manages message input, displays chat messages, interacts with ChatService to send messages, and provides a UI for conversation.

classes.name: ChatScreen
classes.description: A Flutter widget representing a chat interface for communication with hotel staff.

classes.name: _ChatScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the chat screen's UI and logic, including message handling and user interaction.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the message controller when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a chat message via ChatService, manages loading state, updates message list, and handles errors.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the chat UI, including message list, input box, and loading indicator.
